title: User Management
description: Manage system users, permissions and security policies

module.title: User Management
module.description: Manage system users, permissions, and security policies

list.title: User Directory
list.description: View and manage all system users, including account status, role permissions, and login history.
list.loginRequiredDesc: You need to sign in to view the user list

register.title: Add User
register.description: Create new system user accounts with initial passwords and access permissions.

password.title: Security Policy Matrix
password.description: Configure security verification levels for operations and password validation requirements for sensitive actions.
password.auditNote: Click 'Save All' to apply changes immediately. All modifications will be recorded in the audit system.

levels.l1: Security verification for low-risk query operations.
levels.l2: Medium security verification for data modification.
levels.l4: Highest level verification for irreversible operations.

btn_commit_sku_fix.name: Submit SKU Fix
btn_commit_sku_fix.desc: Confirm manually corrected abnormal SKU data.

btn_run_transform.name: Confirm Data Import
btn_run_transform.desc: Write processed data to sales data table.

btn_generate_report.name: Generate Report
btn_generate_report.desc: Start full analytics engine to generate BI reports.

btn_download_report.name: Download Report
btn_download_report.desc: Download single or batch download all report files.

btn_clear_reports.name: Clear Reports
btn_clear_reports.desc: Clear all report files for current user.

btn_unlock_visuals.name: Unlock View
btn_unlock_visuals.desc: Identity verification required before entering visualization module.

btn_po_create.name: Create Purchase Order
btn_po_create.desc: Create new purchase order and write to database.

btn_po_modify.name: Modify Order
btn_po_modify.desc: Modify purchase order strategy or details.

btn_po_upload_invoice.name: Upload Invoice
btn_po_upload_invoice.desc: Upload or replace vendor invoice file.

send_order_create.name: Create Shipment
send_order_create.desc: Create new shipment and write to database.

btn_send_modify.name: Modify Shipment
btn_send_modify.desc: Modify shipment logistics or cargo details.

btn_send_upload_invoice.name: Upload Invoice
btn_send_upload_invoice.desc: Upload or replace shipment invoice file.

btn_receive_confirm.name: Confirm Receiving
btn_receive_confirm.desc: Confirm received quantity and complete receiving.

btn_receive_mgmt_edit.name: Edit Receiving
btn_receive_mgmt_edit.desc: Confirm edit receiving quantity and save.

btn_abnormal_process.name: Process Exception
btn_abnormal_process.desc: Execute exception handling, correct shipment or order data.

btn_abnormal_delete.name: Delete Exception
btn_abnormal_delete.desc: Delete processed exception record, undo previous corrections.

logistic_payment_confirm.name: Confirm Logistics Payment
logistic_payment_confirm.desc: Batch confirm logistics payments and record.

btn_prepay_submit.name: Submit Prepayment
btn_prepay_submit.desc: Add prepayment record to supplier account.

deposit_payment_submit.name: Confirm Deposit
deposit_payment_submit.desc: Batch confirm deposit payments and record.

deposit_payment_delete.name: Delete Deposit
deposit_payment_delete.desc: Delete deposit record and restore prepayment.

po_payment_submit.name: Confirm Order Payment
po_payment_submit.desc: Batch confirm order payments and record.

po_payment_delete.name: Delete Order Payment
po_payment_delete.desc: Delete order payment and restore prepayment.

btn_sync_inventory.name: Sync Inventory Data
btn_sync_inventory.desc: Write uploaded stocktake data to inventory table.

btn_update_single_inv.name: Fix Single Inventory
btn_update_single_inv.desc: Modify inventory value for specific SKU and date.

btn_drop_inv_col.name: Delete Inventory Column
btn_drop_inv_col.desc: Physically delete entire inventory column (high risk).

btn_create_skus.name: Batch Create SKUs
btn_create_skus.desc: Batch create SKUs and initialize inventory.

btn_generate_barcode.name: Generate Barcode
btn_generate_barcode.desc: Batch generate barcode PDF based on SKU and packaging.

btn_restore_db.name: Restore Database
btn_restore_db.desc: Restore database from historical snapshot (high risk).

btn_clean_data.name: Clean Data
btn_clean_data.desc: Physically delete business data by date range.

btn_delete_user.name: Delete User
btn_delete_user.desc: Permanently delete user profile and related data.

btn_unlock_view.name: Unlock Sensitive Data
btn_unlock_view.desc: Unlock and view all masked data.

btn_toggle_dev_mode.name: Toggle Dev Mode
btn_toggle_dev_mode.desc: Toggle logging system's development mode status.

capabilities.title: Capability Boundaries
capabilities.description: Dynamically control Admin role operation permissions. Changes take effect immediately.
capabilities.hint: This panel only controls regular Admin permissions. Superuser has all permissions and is not affected.

notice.title: Important Notes
notice.adminOnly: Only Superuser can access this configuration panel
notice.auditLogged: All changes are recorded in the audit log
notice.instantEffect: Changes take effect immediately without restart
notice.l3Required: L1 + L4 security codes required to save configuration
notice.loginRequired: Only logged-in users can access system features

createUser.title: Allow Create New User
createUser.desc: Authorize admin to create new login accounts.

lockUser.title: Allow Lock/Unlock
lockUser.desc: Authorize admin to freeze violating accounts.

resetPassword.title: Allow Reset Password
resetPassword.desc: Authorize admin to forcibly change user passwords.

managePerms.title: Allow Module Permission Management
managePerms.desc: Authorize admin to modify user module access permissions.

changeRole.title: Allow Role Adjustment
changeRole.desc: Authorize admin to promote/demote users. Involves privilege escalation.

deleteUser.title: Allow Delete User
deleteUser.desc: Authorize admin to permanently delete users.

username.label: Username
username.hint: 3-50 characters, letters, numbers, and underscore only

permissions.title: Module Permissions
permissions.description: Configure accessible modules and sub-features. Changes take effect after user re-login.

notice.title: Operation Notes
notice.rowIsModule: Each row is a functional module
notice.rightFeatures: Right side shows all features in module
notice.grayNoAccess: Gray items are not configurable by you
notice.passthroughDesc: You can only grant permissions you own.
notice.effectTimeDesc: Changes take effect after user re-login.
notice.auditTrailDesc: All changes are logged in audit system.

messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
messages.confirmLock: Are you sure you want to lock this user?
messages.confirmUnlock: Are you sure you want to unlock this user?
messages.confirmPromote: Are you sure you want to promote this user to admin?
messages.confirmDemote: Are you sure you want to demote this admin to regular user?

errors.cannotDeleteSelf: You cannot delete your own account
errors.cannotLockSelf: You cannot lock your own account
errors.insufficientPermission: Insufficient permission to perform this action
errors.hierarchyViolation: Cannot modify users with same or higher role level
errors.ROLE_ESCALATION_BLOCKED: Cannot create user with this role level
errors.PROTECTED_USER: Cannot perform this action on system admin
errors.PERMISSION_PASSTHROUGH_VIOLATION: Permission violation: includes items beyond your access
errors.REASON_REQUIRED: Reason is required for user deletion
errors.USE_CHANGE_OWN_PASSWORD: Use the dedicated interface to change your own password
errors.ROLE_CONFLICT: Role name or level already exists
errors.ROLE_IN_USE: Role is in use and cannot be deleted

roles.title: Role Management
roles.description: Manage system roles and permission boundaries

messages.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields
messages.enterL4Code: Enter L4 security code to confirm deletion
messages.enterL1L4Code: Saving boundary configuration requires L1 + L4 dual verification
messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete role '{name}'? This cannot be undone.

security.requiresL2: This action requires L2 security verification
security.requiresL3: This action requires L3 security verification
